website_summaries.verdict: Attractive, sturdy, and durable, the kind of birdbath that can last a lifetime.
pros: Users love the fact that the bowl locks onto its pedestal, so it can't be knocked off by overzealous wildlife
The high-quality material and hand-painted design are beautiful
cons: Rare cracks have been reported during colder months

customer_reviews.title: NOT BRIGHT BLUE
customer_reviews.text: Came unbroken! Yay! Thats a huge concern of mine when ordering large fragile items online. The color is NOT AT ALL the same. It's a lighter more muted cornflower blue, definitely not a peacock blue/sapphire color. Pretty darn disappointed in that. It looks sturdy and well made, we will see how it weathers.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed - defective finish
customer_reviews.text: I already own 2 of this exact same model from Burley and I like them because they are deep and have a hollow bottom. Have never seen this color in local stores. This one...now I see why it's not in stores but being sold online secondarily - they must have had a bad production run. The surfaces are all pitted and discolored. Very disappointed. Lesson learned - don't buy things like this online. My other ones have no defects at all.
customer_reviews.author: MAB

customer_reviews.title: Bowl cracked in half after only 3 months - DO NOT BUY THIS IT HAS NO WARRANTY!
customer_reviews.text: The bowl cracked in half after 3 MONTHS! It wasn't hit, hurt or mishandled. The clay in the break was very porous indicating poor construction. Worst of all the seller doesn't stand behind it's product at all. I just got an email back from them basically telling me to lump it. I guess I will have to - but I will never buy anything from Plum Struck again.
customer_reviews.author: G. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: Really lovely. Far nicer than I honestly expected to get on Amazon. My only reservation is that the bowl isn’t super secure on the base - it has a locking pin but it doesn’t fasten snugly, so I just hope it holds up to any gusts of wind. But otherwise it’s really nice. Sturdy clay with a really pretty design. The bowl is glazed on the inside so it’s smooth and easier to clean. It is a bit deep so I placed some river rocks in a little pile on one edge so that small birds, bees and butterflies have a place to land without feeling like they’ll drown in a deep pool. I really enjoy it and recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got this as a Christmas gift and loved it! After setting it up in a great ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas gift and loved it! After setting it up in a great place in my yard, it broke in the middle (cracked) after a month! Talk about high quality! It's very thin material in the middle where it sits on the pedestal. Returning it was no option because it's too heavy to deal with. My husband is a fixer and he repaired it! Would not recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVED IT...... until the bowl cracked in November
customer_reviews.text: The water in the bowl froze when the temps got into the low 30's. The bowl cracked. Seriously! This bowl couldn't handle ice in November. How is it supposed to make it through January and February? This looked great in my garden for all of 7 months until the bowl cracked. I don't remember reading about bringing this in for the winter months. So sad! Don't know how to contact the seller or what their warranty is.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Color is different from pictured.
customer_reviews.text: Wishing I had read the reviews more closely before purchasing... The color is NOT EVEN CLOSE to what is pictured here. Mine is a light blue color with a tan rim, not remotely the nice dark turquoise I thought I was getting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I received this today I would like to return it as missing glaze in spots very ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this today I would like to return it as missing glaze in spots very poor coverage. I won’t return because of the shipping price
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Color not turquoise.
customer_reviews.text: The birdbath was not even close to the color pictured. It was so dark it appeared almost black. Will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Uniquely Beautiful Birdbath
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful bird bath! Fairly lightweight, so easy to put in place. It would be nice if there was a way to lock in the basin rather than just place on the top, but a bit of plumbers putty did the trick to secure it. I did fill it to the top, as it is a deep basin and small birds might not be able to reach the water perched on the edge of the basin unless it is full. The color is nicer than in the photo, kind of a pale green with the lavender accents. The basin interior is glazed tan. Really pretty!!
customer_reviews.author: CherylV

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Like some of the other reviewers on here, I love the look of the bird bath and the color of the glaze, but, it fell apart after 4 months. The bowl is cracked in a circle all the way around the base, and one crack extends past the rim. These are not little cracks, the largest is about 1/4 inch wide and all the way through. Love the bird bath, but the clay work is garbage. Return period is 30 days, so it looks like I am out of luck. Which is too bad because the bird bath is beautiful. Beautiful but worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Birds don't like it
customer_reviews.text: The color does not match that shown in the photo at all. Mine appears mottled instead of the pattern shown and is more dark blue than turquoise. The top screws on but then doesn't come off easily so you can clean it and I get hard water spot build-up fairly quickly. Lastly the birds don't like it either. With my old birdbath the birds used to flock to it. In two weeks I've seen 3 birds in total use the new one and all of them were there at the same time. Not sure why they don't like it but I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bird baths
customer_reviews.text: I love these bird baths! And so do the birds. They are a bit heavy but come packed very, very well in thick styrofoam. They need to be heavy so when other critters like squirrels jump up on them, they won’t tip over. The one on the left, I just received. The other one I’ve had for a couple of years. They are about 2-3 inches deep and the inside of the bowls are glazed. The designs on the base are very pretty and keep their color.
customer_reviews.author: Donna J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Well made birdbath
customer_reviews.text: Packaged VERY well. There's no way this will break in shipment. Delivery was fast and it is beautiful. It is really beautiful. I love that the bowl locks into the base. This birdbath has a deeper bowl than some others which means it holds more water so that I can use a solar pump in it. Very well made. I'm very happy with it. It is very heavy so I won't have to worry about it blowing over.
customer_reviews.author: mtn16165

customer_reviews.title: Bird Bath that the birds love
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color, convenient height and a nice deep water bowl. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Burns

customer_reviews.title: We liked this fountain. It looks beautiful but...
customer_reviews.text: It has a visible hole ( sized 1/2" long x 3/8" wide) at the top edge of the fountain bowl. We put some glue to plug it up but quickly leaked into inside, then we used grout to touch up the hole before using another layer of the glue to seal it up.
customer_reviews.author: TwoMetreBill

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fountain
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy watching the birds take a dip. Very well made and lightweight so as to move easily. Easy to clean also. Came packaged extremely well.
customer_reviews.author: ComeAsYouAre

customer_reviews.title: Not the color shown in picture.
customer_reviews.text: What I received was a solid turquoise color bird bath. disappointed, but still nice enough to work. Easy to assemble and light enough for me to move. I decided to keep it but was disappointed in color. The the reason for only 3 stars is because of the color of bird bath.
customer_reviews.author: Sewing lady

customer_reviews.title: Received with cracked piece at bottom of basin
customer_reviews.text: Have just received this gorgeous looking bird bath. Alas, upon inspection, I discovered that the knob at the bottom of the basin is cracked; it is obvious that the knob will soon break off completely. This knob (with a pin through it) is what fits onto the column and holds it in place. I have posted a request for replacement of the basin. My alternative request is to return the entire bird bath (whereupon I may consider ordering another one). Will post an update here with the rest of the story. I love this bird bath but quality control for it is unsatisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: ydanne

customer_reviews.title: Feels heavy like I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Decent price. Feels heavy like I wanted. Rim can be gripped by birds. Was hoping top fit more snug to base so it couldn’t wobble, but I suppose it’s good enough as is.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Gump

customer_reviews.title: It has a beautiful finish and is really easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Packed extremely well, this bird bath came without a scratch on it. I wish other sellers would pack this well. It has a beautiful finish and is really easy to put together. It comes in two pieces. The top "saucer" part twists into the base and that's it. It's fairly heavy, so I wouldn't worry about it blowing over in heavy wind. About twenty minutes after I put this in the yard and filled it with water, several finches came to take baths and a cardinal came to drink. The birds approve. Great quality, great shipping, great all around.
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy!
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was 2 Days from ordering and it looks great in the landscape! Assembled in as simple...tab A in slot B and turn to lock. The bath basin holds 2 gallons of water. A solar fountain will top it off. Anyone that scores it low due to freezing temps cracking has never owned a non plastic bath as this will happen to ALL ceramic and plaster bird baths. At the first date of freezing temps, empty, clean and cover or store the bath!
customer_reviews.author: JWL

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but the top is designed poorly
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, but the top is designed poorly. It should have a small bump out to fit snugly in the bottom. The manufacture needs to take note. This poor design make it very easy for the top to fall off in high winds or if a squirrel tries to drink from it. Do not know what they were thinking. I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia H. Diers

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and well-made
customer_reviews.text: The birdbath is just gorgeous, sturdy and well-made. The picture is a bit off as the bath has a green tint to is (as is advertised at end of description), but it is not overstated and fits in well near our concrete garden bench and rock garden border. The product was packaged well and came in perfect condition. Lots of friend compliments and worth the price for us!
customer_reviews.author: Robin L. Miller

customer_reviews.title: At last, the bath I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: It holds plenty of water (can last for several days without refilling if needed), yet is not so deep as to be a hazard to birds... It can and does support the weight of the visiting squirrel, and is very attractive to the eye. The bowl interlocks with the tower for stability, easily tips for dumping, and has been an asset to my yard. I have gone through several bird baths before, looking for the best for my yard. Too bad I didn't look here first. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: D. Creekmur

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We liked the look; beautiful! However, the small birds could not grip the edge to “dunk & drink”, nor would they bathe... too slippery and deep for them. Our blue jay & robins used it sparingly... so we are disappointed that our birds basically have stopped coming....
customer_reviews.author: Margaret D. Casarez

customer_reviews.title: Somewhere there is a leak.
customer_reviews.text: Positive: this is easy to assemble, was properly boxed, is a beautiful shade of blue Negative: I don't know where it is leaking yet, but it is leaking. I have put water into the basin and it quickly leaks onto the ground. The floating fountain I purchased is not supported by the water that is left in the basin so it cannot work properly.
customer_reviews.author: willie

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice in back yard.
customer_reviews.text: I hope the neighborhood birds appreciate my investment in their cleanliness. Stick the top on the base, add some colorful stones if you like and fill with water. Then wait for birds and other creatures to find it. Place it near a bush or tree to give birds a feeling of security. Sits sturdy on ground. Basin locks onto stem for stability. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Chris J.

customer_reviews.title: A pretty birdbath.
customer_reviews.text: The first birdbath I ordered had to be returned because the top was broken into many pieces. It hadn't been properly attached to the rigid styrofoam that it was in, within the box and it arrived damaged. I quickly advised Amazon, and another one was immediately sent to me, without damage. The broken one was picked up by UPS. So, I was generally pleased with how it was handled. The birdbath itself is very nice, but the picture on the computer makes the body or background of the piece look ivory/beige. In person, it has a bit of a greenish cast to it. It is still a nice piece and I am happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: dr2mom

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty birdbath
customer_reviews.text: We love the design of this birdbath. It is very pretty, and seems to be well-made. It assembles quickly and the top can easily be removed for cleaning. It feels sturdy and we do not worry about it knocking over. We put a solar fountain in the birdbath to keep the water moving, which looks really nice. We have not, unfortunately, attracted that many birds with it. We have tried a couple of different locations, and have only had a few birds try it out. We are thinking it may be because we live in a wooded areas near a lake and filled with streams, so perhaps the birds are not needing a water source.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tindell

customer_reviews.title: so pretty, works great
customer_reviews.text: This arrived well packed in fine condition. It is beautiful and I would not change one thing. The color is darker green than what appears on my monitor, which is great because my house trim is very dark green, the exact color of this. My monitor color looks almost turquoise it has such a blue cast. These are made for my area, the desert, where the winters are warm and we don't worry as much about freezing. If the stand were not hollow it would weigh too much to move. There is a red straw inside a hole on the bottom of the bowl that locks the bowl in place, it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: TracyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: A life time bird bath!
customer_reviews.text: I had bought two other bird baths just like this one from another source. Throughout the years they are the only ones still standing through the rain, hail, heat. I love this birdbath and will not buy any other type. You will get your money worth.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Packaged well and looks great in my yard. fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely bird bath
customer_reviews.text: This bird bath is gorgeous. The finish is very high quality. The top attaches to the base by aligning plastic pins into slots in the base and twisting. I put mine on a 16" stepping stone and it is quite stable. About once a week I spray the bowl with the hose to keep algae from growing on it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but useless
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color and arrived intact. However the locking mechanism is poorly fabricated and does not lock tightly enough to prevent the bowl from falling off the stand. The locking post in the bowl is not long enough or they made the hole in the base too large. Either way, they don’t connect securely enough to stay together. Squirrels and even spraying water into the bowl to clean it is enough to knock it off.
customer_reviews.author: buster

customer_reviews.title: birds and the bees
customer_reviews.text: The top locks.....this is the BEST feature OF ALL~~!!! I have lost SO MANY LIDS, due to squirrels and raccoons knocking them down........BUT.......no more. This birdbath is beautiful, too. Yes, i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M. Cole

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IF YOU LIVE IN A COLDER CLIMATE!!!
customer_reviews.text: STAY AWAY!!! Product will fall apart once temp. drops below 40 degrees and seller has "conveniently" left this crucial fact off Amazon's website. When I complained, seller told me THEIR website and the manufacturer's warranty states this fact. WHY ISN'T THIS INFO. CLEARLY STATED HERE ON AMAZON??? Very deceptive practice! You don't reasonably assume a $100 birdbath will fall apart the first time the fall temp. dips below 40 degrees!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our yard in Prescott Arizona. Lasted about a year. We do NOT get harsh weather extremes: a little snow and occasional lows in the 20s. Summer days max out in the 90s only. Not like Phoenix at all. This product worked and looked great the first year. Mid-winter this year it developed several cracks emanating from the center. Went to lift the bowl off the pedestal and the bowl immediately fell apart into about 8 pieces. Overall not worth the money since you will have to replace it with a brand new one annually. This product *might* last longer as an indoor decoration or perhaps if you brought it inside during the winter months.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Lee

customer_reviews.title: I love this bird bath and it looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Arrived to Hawaii well packed and whole. It is really a piece of art and the price was right. So far, after 3 months or so I have no complaints. It is just beautiful in our yard. Kudos to the makers. I do see the price went up a lot recently, but really can't blame them. My birds love it and I always get compliments. Easy to clean, deep enough for good bird baths without evaporating to nothing during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: The birds flock to this birdbath
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I bought this because the birds flock to this birdbath. I get so much enjoyment watching robins and other beautiful birds bathing in this birdbath or just drinking from it. It came to me fast and packed very well. It was in two pieces that was so simple to assemble. Once you assemble the birdbath it is very sturdy and ready to go. Just follow the instructions and you will have a birdbath that that will last for ever. it is great quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Haddad

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful turquoise color without ornamentation. It looks modern and is pretty easy to clean. The top screws on, and I just carefully tip it over and spray it out. I also use a solar-powered fountain to keep the water bubbling for the birds. They still seem to use the gutters more to bathe, but I'm hoping that ends when I replace those next. I have seen them drinking from this water though so that is good.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Well built and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and well built. I was a little nervous about ordering a mail order bird bath because of shipping damage but it arrived perfectly intact. The locking top is secure. It's fairly deep so I don't have to constantly refill it either. The glaze is slightly lighter than on the photograph, but definitely a true blue, not a pastel or robin's egg color, just slightly less vivid.
customer_reviews.author: CastDent

customer_reviews.title: Broken by the wind
customer_reviews.text: Wind knocked it over the second day I used it, and the base broke into three pieces
customer_reviews.author: cami

customer_reviews.title: Great color and well made bird bath
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color and sturdy construction! Nice addition to the garden!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Grubaugh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful bird bath
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in excellent co diction because of the great packing techniques. I LOVE this birdbath and my Back yard birds do to. I’ve just had it up for about a month with no severe weather. Once BAD summer storms/hurricane season begins I will probably take the top off and maybe secure the base in a down position......because I worry! But seriously it feels pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Roberts

customer_reviews.title: It will crack in cold weather
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last summer and this winter it cracked in 3 pieces. No warning about this when I bought it. It would also be difficult to store in winter. You should only buy if you south of the Mason Dixie Line. Kevin
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN F. FEENEY

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Practical. Sturdy. Beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bird bath in teal a couple years ago for our daughter's birthday. Since preschool, she wanted us to have a bird bath in our yard. I left it out over winter, and the bowl broke. I fixed it with super glue and filled it with pansies. I bought another bird bath in bright blue. I'm very happy with the price, simplicity of design and care of this bird bath.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: A lovely, reasonably priced garden ornament.
customer_reviews.text: This birdbath looks exactly as it does in the picture. The price was very reasonable and, a big plus to me, it's made in the USA. It was shipped promptly, packed well and is completely to my liking. It's a two-piece set but there is a simple 1/4 twist that keeps the basin from being knocked off. Even if no birds ever use it, it is worth what I paid just to look out my window at it. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L. Lindell

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful bird bath. Color is outstanding! Packing is second to none. Don't be afraid to order. Best feature is top locks onto base, which I missed in description. Very Happy.
customer_reviews.author: CARL 37027

customer_reviews.title: Burley and Zane hummingbird bird baths without complete glaze
customer_reviews.text: This lovely dark blue bird bath is glazed over the entire surface of the bowl.It does not let algae grow and so the maintenance is a breeze It is a beautiful addition to my garden I would recommend inquiry on the others offered, to be sure bowl surface is glazed.This will save you lots of scrubbing out algae.I purchased the hummingbird bitd bath and the surface is not completely glazed. Lots of scrubbing! Burley and Zane makes quality items and they are quite substantial in weight so not easily knocked over by thirsty animals. my only comment would be a suggestion to be more clear about items that are not completely glazed. ..
customer_reviews.author: diana b

customer_reviews.title: bird bath
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this bird bath looks! So pretty. I purchased a solar fountain pump to go with this. However, I don't know if the bird bath is too shallow, or if the fountain pump spills the water, but I have to fill it daily. This was unexpected. Consequently it does not always have water because it dries up! Still love the bird bath.
customer_reviews.author: Nana H

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful made in the USA with care and quality!
customer_reviews.text: I Love this bird bath, but haven't had a chance to use it yet. It very well made, and I couldn't be happier that its made in the USA! It looks so pretty sitting out by my flower beds. I am going to need to secure the base to the bowl, because we get high winds being near a lake, but that's not a big deal. I would definitely buy from them again. The bath was packed and protected in the box very well.
customer_reviews.author: L. Shea

customer_reviews.title: Shorter than expected.
customer_reviews.text: It is a really cute little bird bath, and well made right here in the USA (or so says the sticker, I've no reason to doubt it). It is good, thick clay, the basin is nicely glazed for a clean finish. But man this thing is knee high to me and I'm only 5'10". I am sure the dimensions are in the description and I am sure they are accurate, I had no basis for comparison and just figured it was the size of a normal bird bath. It's actually cuter though because it is short.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Cox

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY happy, great blue color - the birds love it !!
customer_reviews.text: We are EXTREMELY happy with this bird bath. I love the color blue, it looks so good on the green lawn, and the birds love it. Within a short time we had many visitors to watch. It arrived in secure packaging, no dings, chips or cracks. We had looked at many bird bath reviews, and a lot were not good. This one rated well with others, so we ordered it. It is well made and stable.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Time will tell
customer_reviews.text: It did take 16 days to arrive, but actually ahead of promised date. Well packaged and looks beautifully done. We will see how it weathers.
customer_reviews.author: Donn Urban

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This birdbath is beautiful, and very easy to piper together - it has a locking system so the bowl doesn’t fall off. We placed the base over a piece of PVC driven into the ground for added stability to prevent tipping when critters nudge it
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Bird Bath
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as an addition to the beautiful flower garden/hummingbird sanctuary he's been building for us. We haven't had it for long but we've already fallen in love with it. The greenery and flowers on the base compliment the garden wonderfully and the birds are starting to take notice again. I'd highly recommend this piece to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: SpeedRacer

customer_reviews.title: Good birdbath
customer_reviews.text: Nice birdbath. Top rotates 90 degrees for easy removal & cleaning. When set back on and rotated 90 degrees top is held in place so it won't fall off. Big enough for back yard use, but not so heavy and cumbersome that it is hard to relocate or clean. We are happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leif

customer_reviews.title: You'll NOT BE disappointed with this Birdbath!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Exquisite! Compliments galore! High-End design. Excellent quality for the price. It was boxed very securely. It was the size and weight expected. The bowl has an built in attachment turn to prevent falling off. The inside of the bowl is glazed with a natural high end look. The stand is adorned with colorful raised 3 D visual images of branches, leaves, and birds which you'll be fortunate to find even at a high end Garden supply!. Stunning for any flower bed, garden or patio!
customer_reviews.author: YesReally

customer_reviews.title: Great birdbath
customer_reviews.text: This bird bath was easy to assemble and easy for one person to carry. The blue is a beautiful, bright hue and it really sticks out in my garden. Despite being only two pieces and no metal screws holding it together, I feel like it is fairly sturdy and doesn’t knock over easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rhianna C

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Just bought back in Jan and it already has cracks and it leaking....
customer_reviews.author: Tara P.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME BIRDBATH
customer_reviews.text: So BEAUTIFUL! This fountain was very well packed and arrived in perfect condition. Set up couldn't be easier...open box, lift pedestal and basin out, bring to spot where you want it and put top on bottom. DONE STAMP. The birds love it. I live in Tucson, AZ in the Sonoran Desert, I get a lot of appreciative birds all day.....LOL
customer_reviews.author: tracy doyle

customer_reviews.title: It's beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bird bath. It's so pretty and adds just a splash of color to my garden. It came quickly and well packaged. I like that the top locks to the bottom. It's deep enough for the solar pump that I purchased to work. It will need to be taken in during the cold freezing water months, but that's okay for me. I would recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fragile, Fragile, Fragile
customer_reviews.text: We received this as a gift in 2018. It cracked into pieces over the winter. This summer, we replaced it as the person who gave it to us is coming to visit. The replacement arrived cracked into several pieces in the box. So, we sent it back and got another. Fortunately, this one arrived fine. I reckon we'll bring it in for the winter...
customer_reviews.author: uburoi

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color.
customer_reviews.text: Came today. Great color! Like the locking top as I have a squirrel that likes to jump up and take a drink.
customer_reviews.author: Carol M

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't detach easily.
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy but the design for the top attaching to the base makes it really difficult to remove the top for water changing and cleaning. Most of the time I can't get it undone and I have to tip the entire bath over. I'm worried this is going to end up breaking the base.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Totally different color then shown.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very pretty simple bird bath but I chose it for the bright blue color they showed, however it’s not a bright blue but more a country blue. There is also a large flaw in the glaze of the base. Not sure if I’m keeping it yet. Hate when things are not as pictured.
customer_reviews.author: THE PHOTOGRAPHER.

customer_reviews.title: I like this birdbath a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this birdbath a lot. I clean and refill daily to reduce chances of mosquitoes and algae. I've even had cranes drink from it! I just bought a replacement because the base was broken by my yard guy. I only noticed when I was clearing stuff out of the yard in preparation for Irma a couple weeks ago. So the old one went to the trash, and the new one is installed.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Nepon-sixt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, good size for focal point in the yard
customer_reviews.text: This looks so pretty in my yard, and was a great price. Shipped well padded. Seems to have come through our hard freezes this year ok (zone 9, so I'm talking a few days in the 20s). Haven't seen any birds in it but it's so pretty I don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: RP

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty but low-quality ceramic material
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous piece, but didn't last long. The base seems fine but the water bowl part shattered without any sort of physical force. I noticed a chunk of the bowl had broken off and when I picked up the bowl, it broke apart into multiple pieces. Upon review of the material, it's a pretty cheap ceramic and by no means fit for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary M

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: The pictures and description show a glazed bowl. The bowl is not glazed. This is going to be extremely difficult to repackage, but it is going back. Really frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Claire M. Bischoff

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in Hawaii well packaged and unscathed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived much more quickly than expected. Looks just like the picture. Think filling the stand with sand is an excellent way to make the base able withstand strong wind. Easily twists on. Good Value.
customer_reviews.author: tlfngal

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY BLUEBIRD BIRD BATH!!!
customer_reviews.text: IT IS ABSOLUTELY "BEAUTIFUL"!!! IT'S VERY DETAILED AND HEAVY! I'M HAPPY WITH IT AND IT'S DEFINITELY WORTH THE PRICE!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Peyton

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful! I'm a retired potter and love the look of this piece... looks antique! Went together perfectly... doesn't need to be tightened too hard at all. Packed very well and is heavy but not like the concrete ones that are SO heavy! Plan to bring in during the winter as I know the bowl won't last if it freezes with water in it. Very well made... you'll love it too!
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Bird bath best around
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Bird bath, we love it very well made, super easy to put together, was packed very well for shipping. no complaints, will order from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Artist de

customer_reviews.title: I don't recommend this product ... it breaks easily ...
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled with this purchase, it's quite beautiful. Unfortunately the bird bath broke after a short time. It was simply sitting in the garden, became full of cracks and will not hold water. I will read reviews more carefully in future as many reviewers had the same issue without resolution by the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Donna  Wauhop

customer_reviews.title: American made product
customer_reviews.text: I as happy to buy American rather than Chinese. The color was not what I expected but I'm okay with it. The finish is not perfect but I'm okay with that too.
customer_reviews.author: deb_unlimited

customer_reviews.title: This bird bath was fine for 7 months
customer_reviews.text: This bird bath was fine for 7 months, then I looked outside and saw that the bowl had cracked roughly in half and the broken piece had fallen to the ground and broke further. The rest of the bowl also has cracks running through it that will certainly also break completely even if a crack repair was attempted. There was a build up of snow on it, but it should not be so brittle that it breaks chunks off. For the price of this item, you shouldn't have to bring it indoors when it gets cold or snow/ice is expected.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Chase

customer_reviews.title: this arrived quickly and was packed beautifully. Secondly
customer_reviews.text: I have to say........WOW!!! First of all, this arrived quickly and was packed beautifully. Secondly, what I think is brilliant is the notch cut out of the base that the top connects to. The top has two very sturdy plastic pieces coming out each side. So when you put the top on the base you align the plastic with the notches and give it a turn securing the two. The other thing I must mention is how well made the bird bath is. Not only is the glazing done perfectly and not skimpy, but the clay is very thick. This is a great purchase and I highly recommend this bird bath. Thanks Amazon for carrying this product!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: nirvana

customer_reviews.title: A Beautiful Garden Centerpiece
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully crafted and well designed bird bath...and it is American made! The bowl is deeper than others I’ve had and it’s interior is glazed and should be easier to clean...I used to have to power wash my old one. And the squirrels knocked my old one over destroying it. This one has an interlocking bowl. Worth every penny. It arrived in a box that looked like it had some abuse, but was so well packed (see photo) that it was unscathed! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jim L

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. Very pretty and secure bowl . There is a notch in base to keep bowl from sliding off. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: mysty

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but wouldn’t purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Product is heavy and came packaged very well. Height is good. The top doesn’t sit flat or straight on the base, and it wobbles. The color is also more of a muted blue; not nearly as bright as the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! Don't leave it out in the winter :(
customer_reviews.text: It's gorgeous but I delayed getting it insurgencies the snow hit. It broke into many pieces. I still have the stand. But will now order another one and put it in the barn with no water or snow in it
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Harmon

customer_reviews.title: poorly built
customer_reviews.text: loved this product but it broke after 4 months just sitting in my yard. Yard is fenced in so I know that no one touched it. Looks just like some others that broke. Guess i am just out my money but will not buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: wizzard

customer_reviews.title: A sparkling addition to the garden
customer_reviews.text: The birdbath was wrapped well and intelligently, because it did not weigh much for a large item. Delivered on the date indicated. The upper bowl locks in place with a twist and unlocks twisted in the opposite direction. Filled it with sand to weight it down. There is no bottom for the base. This was a little disconcerting, but the maker must have a reason for this. This bird bath is beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: ExperiencedBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Last
customer_reviews.text: This bird bath is beautiful but sadly it just doesn't last! We bought this for a 'Mothers Day' gift and after a couple freezes it cracked very badly! I was disappointed to say the least it only lasted maybe 6 months? And for the price just not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Valentine

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL, Quality bird bath!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was packaged extremely well, which was my #1 concern when ordering something like this online. No worries - it arrived in one piece! I have gotten so many compliments on this bird bath - the color is just beautiful. Vibrant, shiny, and the top is soooo easy to remove to dump out water and replace - one turn and it lifts right off, yet it's completely secure when put back on. I HIGHLY recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The artwork is beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We are looking forward to setting it out in the yard this spring. We like watching the birds all winter with our feeders so now we will see them in the spring and summer time playing with the water. We also purchased the fountain pump and hope that will attract them more.
customer_reviews.author: bevwin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bird bath is beautiful!! Packed well and arrived in great condition. It is not as heavy as I expected so very easy to move. Will be setting it up outside today!!
customer_reviews.author: Lois Gigliotti

customer_reviews.title: very pretty and well made
customer_reviews.text: Base was damaged in shipping, had to return. The birdbath is really pretty and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey D.

customer_reviews.title: VERY disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this beautiful piece last year and set it up in our garden. We have been very pleased with it until a couple of weeks ago when I noticed that the inside of the bowl was pealing and tracking. I am so very disappointed as it is too late to return. I have tried contacting the sellers, but not reply as of yet. I would love for them to replace the bowl.
customer_reviews.author: R.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking is but very poor design
customer_reviews.text: This is my second bird bath. The top fell off and broke in half due to extremely poor design. I like the looks, the base is very sturdy but the only thing holding the top on is a little piece of plastic that fits into a groove. However, this an upgrade from the last one. The last one I had the top was held on by a little wooden rod, at least this one looks like plastic....we’ll see how it holds up. This is my second and final purchase of this item. And the price increased by 40% in a 3year period. Looks nice and the birds love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Looney

customer_reviews.title: I did an inch by inch inspection when it arrived and was perfect. I happen to have a few planters that ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous piece.and my parrot loves it. I did an inch by inch inspection when it arrived and was perfect. I happen to have a few planters that match that color which by the way is well represented in the advertisement. I'm happy to have a very nice looking and usable bird bath for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and function
customer_reviews.text: I love this bird bath! It is very sturdy and stays in place. I bought a solar fountain and I now have a whole family of cardinals that come multiple times daily to eat and drink. Great value for the price and looks as well!
customer_reviews.author: Why do I even...

customer_reviews.title: Simply Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This bird bath is a beautiful addition to my garden. Have owned a few other bird baths and this one is by far the best. Highly recommend to all!!
customer_reviews.author: Gary P.

customer_reviews.title: Great bath, ordering replacement bowl
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a housewarming gift for a friend who loves Cardinals. He was very surprised by it when he got home because I already had it set up and he truly loves it. Was purchased in 2018 and as of September 23, 2019, our dogs knocked it over and it has a major piece out of the side of the bowl. I’m looking at Burley Clay site to order a replacement bowl because I’m not sure what to use to repair it.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Aiken

customer_reviews.title: Lovely.
customer_reviews.text: It looks very pretty in my garden. Sadly, after about three weeks, I have only seen one bird visit it. I just got a solar fountain and am hoping that it will call to the birds. We have had drought conditions for two years now, and I am concerned about the little critters being able to find water. We have a fountain with a pump that just bubbles in the front yard and crows drink from it and finches bathe in it. I hope that the addition of the solar fountain will attract the birds to use it. I'll let you know.
customer_reviews.author: Tiaramonkeybird

customer_reviews.title: Color not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The color isn't as nice as pictured. But I couldn't bear the thought of having to send back such a massive item. It's a little disappointing to spend so much and not have it be what you'd hoped for. But it is sturdy and it was sweet to see birds using it during an endless and terribly hot Nashville summer. I don't think the birds minded one bit the color!
customer_reviews.author: Barley's luminary

customer_reviews.title: Happy with order
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th Burley Clay birdbath...the decorative colors are very attractive and I would purchase again as the cost is reasonable too.
customer_reviews.author: DIW

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bird bath, came in perfect condition and the color is just gorgeous, even nicer than the picture-very happy with this purchase (and so are the birds)
customer_reviews.author: beatlefan

product_meta.title: Burley Clay Zanesville Blue Glazed Bath Set
product_meta.description: Style:Zanesville - Locking| Color:BlueBurley Clay bird baths are made from a unique blend of the finest clay in the southeastern Ohio mines. All baths details are hand painted.
feature_bullets: Our clay birdbaths are pottery with a passion with clay sourced from Ohio mines and made in the USA
Beautifully crafted, American-made clay bird baths will make your garden come alive
Birds love water sources and will provide a great drinking and preening area
Top of the bird bath locks in place and can be removed for easy storing during the colder months

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars685 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
